title: Create an Item
description:
# Create an Item

Item is a product or a service offered by your company, or something you buy as a part of your supplies or raw materials.

Items are integral to everything you do in GalaxyNext - from billing, purchasing to managing inventory. Everything you buy or sell, whether it is a physical product or a service is an Item. Items can be stock, non-stock, variants, serialized, batched, assets, etc.
